sect1.title: ExternalLogicalFileName

row.entry: A null-terminated string containing the IP address of the remote machine.
A null-terminated string containing the path/name of the file.
ExternalLogicalFileName returns returns a VARSTRING (null-terminated) value.

sect1.para: The ExternalLogicalFileName function returns an appropriately encoded external logical file name that can be used to directly read a file from any node that is running the dafilesrv utility (typically a landing zone). It handles upper case characters by escaping those characters in the return string.
